long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some Random Utilities That You May Wanna Use Or Not.

This is a hobby side project!

Currently, there is only 4 features available.
Dice: Roll up-to 10 dices(6faces) at once to get the result instantly and see the result of every individual dice!
Crypto Checker: Check Current Pricing and 30 Days Price Chart
Lorem Ipsum Generator: Generate Paragraph(s) of Lorem Ipsum Text
